code: import axios from'axios';axios.defaults.xsrfCookieName='csrftoken';axios.defaults.xsrfHeaderName='X-CSRFToken';function getCookie(name){var cookieValue=null;if(document.cookie&&document.cookie!==''){var cookies=document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i<cookies.length;i++){var cookie=cookies[i].replace(' ','');if(cookie.substring(0,name.length+1)===name+'='){cookieValue=decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length+1));break;}}}return cookieValue;}var csrftoken=getCookie('csrftoken');export{csrftoken};
